definitions: a person who ropes a steer by its heels (as opposed to its head), especially in a team-roping rodeo event

examples.text: when the steer runs through the loop, the heeler must quickly pull the slack out of his rope

shortDefinitions: person who ropes heels of steer

definitions: a sheepdog or cattle dog trained to drive animals by running or nipping at their heels

examples.text: my dog is a heeler and so doesn't require much grooming

shortDefinitions: cattle dog trained to drive animals by nipping at their heels
